As 2020 progressed a discussion was had in relation to the best way to communicate with our Community. A decision was made to create an open Facebook Page for our Clan Members, Fans, and Followers to facilitate that requirement. In May of 2020 works began on bringing some historical content over to a visual platform for our community to better follow UNIT's Trials and Tribulations along with our Successes. Therefore a Facebook page and Youtube Channel were created.
If you wish to follow us on both please click on the Facebook and Youtube channel icons on this tab.
For more information please feel free to contact us through our contact page.
Thanks again to our family and friends who have supported us in our endeavors and the UNIT Clan Members for their massive involvement in building a community with UNIT.

[News May 2020]
NEWS, UPDATES & MORE
WELCOME UNIT MALONE
With recruitment on the rise and the positive response we are receiving through our website and social media platforms we would like to welcome the newest member of the UNIT Clan – UNIT MALONE.
After making it through the player Vetting Process - UNIT MALONE brings a unique perspective to the game of PUBG and has been welcomed with open arms into the UNIT Clan Ranks.
If you wish to keep up to date with whats going on with UNIT. Consider subscribing to our facebook page.
[KEEP IN TOUCH]
CCB 10 Man (PUBG) League
Its Week 1 of the CCB 10 Man League Games and UNIT are off to a flying start with a Chicken Dinner in the First 4 games of the League.

Its a long road to the Top of the PUBG CCB League with Tough Competition from experienced clans. This video has some highlights and also some great kills from the UNIT Clans. Thanks to UNIT Dog45, UNIT Leader12 & UNIT McPotato for recording their game play lastnight.

UNIT Yeti
WELCOME UNIT YETI
Welcome UNIT YETI to the UNIT Clan. Yeti is the 4th Player to join the North American Team. UNIT Yeti, since joining UNIT brings a flare to the team and has championed an amazing attitude during heated competition. We look forward to playing with Yeti during the CCB 10 Man League.
UNIT HAS JOINED TWITCH
UNIT are now on Twitch and will be streaming during the CCB 10 Man League - Friday, Saturday & Sunday 8pm GMT/ 3pm EST
Follow us live and leave a comment during competition. Links to UNIT streaming Players are below. Hope you enjoy the games:
